description:
Jinbei is chased and captured by the people of Kishuu at the order of Sanada Yukimura.  The village of Iwamatsu, where he is kept, is attacked by bandits, and he wins the hearts of the people by chasing them off.  However, there is only a brief moment of rest.  Two of the ten crucifix insects, the Rokurou Combo, take a girl hostage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sanada Yukimura no Wana! Otazunemono Houimou!!
Sanada Yukimura`s Trap! Caught in a Net!!
真田幸村の罠! お尋ね者包囲網!!
